info.name: UserStyles, How it Should Have Been
info.description:
Dark, simple, clean, without Android.
These four elements lived together in harmony...
info.additionalInfo:
Release!
- Dark!
- Simple!
- Clean!
- Lacking Android elements because ew!

Update 1
- Adding a maximum size to textareas so they don't go over the egde of the div they're in (and become unable to be resized afterward as a result)

Update 2
- Minor changes to textarea elements
- Minor cleanup
- Did a little on the UserStyles Forum, and re-experienced how god-awful that is.
